name: Rekoil
summary: Set in a world devastated by an unrelenting pandemic, Rekoil is a fast action & highly balanced arena shooter that allows players to frag each other to oblivion. With 7 different game modes, 10 maps, & over 40 different weapons, Rekoil is the action FPS refined to its purest form ensuring the fun is maximized & the best player with the greatest skills & most points wins. Whether you enjoy the free flowing acrobatics found in run and gun gaming, or prefer the patient tactical approach, Rekoil can be set up to play the way you want to game.
